title: (x) 'Atelier' unexpected display serif - Serlio {Mike Y}
content:
I've seen this typeface around twice now, and not been able to place it. Any help? I saw it on a book cover (the .png here) and a sign for a new condo on 3rd ave and 14th st in New York.

I'd love to use it for a project but can't find any info in it!

Thanks  
Nick

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 90.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202024620/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2090.png) | 27.3 KB |
author: nickvogelson

comments.content:
I think that's Serlio. The middle E serif is a feature.

- Mike Yanega

Here is Adobe's version of [Serlio](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202024620/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/serlio/).

- Mike Yanega

Thank you thank you!

have a great holiday

Nick
